47.description: (Cookie) A flag that indicates whether or not a page view is the start of a session. A value of 1 means yes and 0 means no.

1.title: Outgoing links attempt

https://community.tealiumiq.com/t5/Tealium-iQ-Tag-Management/How-to-set-the-link-tracking-extension-to-track-all-links-except/m-p/5478/highlight/true#M299

FORCE

15.notes: This isn't defined in the dataLayer (oversight), but can easily be pulled from the 'html' attribute on each page with a little JS.
15.title: SCRAPE language code from html lang attribute, only take first part

16.title: Remove product_sku if present (always 'null', confusing but autogenerated by our Demandware template
16.notes: Won't remove it from Deployer reports, but will fix it for Live Events / AS, etc (and remove it from the places people look for UDO info).

17.title: UNFINISHED : Add reviews section / menu option - NEEDS DIGITAS

18.notes: This rule is impossible, which allows us to manually fire the modal after a set delay
18.title: Modal: Creative: DE
18.mdlBaseCss: #_tealiumModalWindow {width : ##MDLWIDTH##px;height : ##MDLHEIGHT##px;position : relative;margin : 100px auto;background-color : #fff;border : 1px solid #000;border-radius : 4px;} #_tealiumModalHeader {position : absolute;width : 95%;padding : 15px;overflow : hidden;font-size : 1.5em;text-align : center;} #_tealiumModalBody {position : absolute;top : 15%;width : 95%;overflow : hidden;padding : 15px;max-height : 55%;font-size : 0.8em;text-align : center;} #_tealiumModalFooter {position : absolute;border-top : 1px solid #CCC;bottom : 2px;height : 10%;padding : 15px;overflow : hidden;width : ##MDLINNERWIDTH##px;font-size : 0.75em;text-align : center;} #_tealiumModalClose {background : #606061;color : #FFFFFF;line-height : 25px;position : absolute;right : -12px;text-align : center;top : -10px;width : 24px;text-decoration : none;font-weight : bold;-webkit-border-radius : 12px;-moz-border-radius : 12px;border-radius : 12px;-moz-box-shadow : 1px 1px 3px #000;-webkit-box-shadow : 1px 1px 3px #000;box-shadow : 1px 1px 3px #000;cursor : pointer;} #_tealiumModalClose:hover { background : #CCC; }
